CIPHER.0.cipherString: Every city in the world always has a gang, a street gang, or the so-called outcasts.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: It's complicated, being an American, Having the money and the bad conscience, both at the same time.
CIPHER.1.question: Solve this aristocrat. The first word is It's.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Without this playing with fantasy no creative work has ever yet come to birth. The debt we owe to the play of the imagination is incalculable.
CIPHER.2.question: Solve this aristocrat. The letter O maps to T.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: I like to stretch myself and push the envelope, so anything that's new or different or not of my daily routine, I am so for.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: Nature is ruthless when it comes to matching the quantity of life in any given place to the quantity of nourishment available.
CIPHER.4.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: The E.U. initially decided to end the isolation of Turkish Cyprus, to balance the accession of Cyprus. But the E.U. has not carried through on its promise.
CIPHER.5.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: We seldom find people ungrateful so long as it is thought we can serve them.
CIPHER.6.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: Surfing for me is more than my lifestyle; it's my passion, my love, and it's a part of me.
CIPHER.7.question: Solve this patristocrat.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Photography can never grow up if it imitates some other medium. It has to walk alone; it has to be itself.
CIPHER.8.question: Solve this patristocrat. The first word is Photography.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: Giving should be entered into in just the same way as investing. Giving is investing.
CIPHER.9.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,3).

CIPHER.10.cipherString: Now we are raising the debt limit 3 times, up to $8 trillion, so that our children and our grandchildren will have to pay for the cost of our expenditures.
CIPHER.10.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: Our marriage is strictly in name only. It has never been consummated.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: Now in my theater training I showed no aptitude at all.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: La guerra es una invención de la mente humana; y la mente humana también puede inventar la paz

CIPHER.16.cipherString: A President cannot always be popular.

CIPHER.17.cipherString: Left eyebrow raised, right eyebrow raised.

CIPHER.18.cipherString: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.

CIPHER.19.cipherString: A SAFE FAIRYLAND IS UNTRUE TO ALL WORLDS.

CIPHER.20.cipherString: As long as we persevere and endure, we can get anything we want.

CIPHER.21.cipherString: If Tyranny and Oppression come to this land, it will be in the guise of fighting a foreign enemy.

CIPHER.22.cipherString: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.

CIPHER.23.cipherString: Life is God's novel. Let him write it.
